link.description: In this section, you will learn about the methods and functions that are available in the Java programming language. You will learn about the different types of methods and functions, how to define them, and how to use them in your programs. You will also learn about the different types of parameters that can be passed to methods and functions, and how to return values from them. Finally, you will learn about the different types of methods and functions that are available in the Java API, and how to use them in your programs.
